However, some of our concerns, such as the binary categorisation of depression severity and the use of unproven methods to determine treatment effectiveness have not been addressed. We will be raising these in full in our response to the consultation. 3/4 #Depression
Following our extensive coalition campaign for change, we welcome @NICEComms addressing one of our fundamental concerns by emphasising the importance of patient choice in the new draft. 2/4 #NICE

Ahead of today's publication of the third draft of the NICE guideline for #depression in adults, 62 MPs and Peers wrote in support of our joint campaign urging NICE to respond to our methodological concerns @munirawilson @JeffSmithetc @NickyMorgan01 @KeeleyMP @DrLisaCameronMP 1/4 https://t.co/5hzrtrz7QC
